Members of the group participate to an ICTP ML woorkhop.

May 09, 2022

The members of the QDRG participated to the week long online Young Researchers’ Workshop on Machine Learning for Materials organized by ICTP.

The Quantum Dynamics Research Group is part of the Condensed Matter Physics Group of the ICTP-East African Institute for Fundamental Research. ICTP-EAIFR is a partner institute of the ICTP and a Category 2 UNESCO institute. It is built from a collaboration between ICTP, the University of Rwanda and the Ministry of Education of Rwanda.
